shortdesc.ph: Sets whether to output the acquired video frame smoothly.

section.p: If you want to get a more even time interval between the obtained video frames, you can register the callback when calling the method, and set the return value of the callback to.

ul.li: Register this callback before joining a channel.
This callback applies to scenarios where the acquired video frame is self-rendered after being processed, not to scenarios where the video frame is sent back to the SDK after being processed.

section.title: Returns
